name: Project:surviving
description: Project: surviving is an indie FP game in the genre of survival. Wild animals and constant hunger with thirst, secrets and a lot of everything is what you will see in the struggle for survival in the game "project: surviving", ready? Then fight for your life right now!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4400 or Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 4200+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb nVidia GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 3870 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 230 MB available space
